players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is dead. This is a shock. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
You: "I'm shocked by Charlie's death. It must be one of us hiding in plain sight. I'm just a villager, so let's all share our thoughts carefully."
Bob: "Diana, you were the last to speak before Charlie died. What were you doing?"
You: "Diana, what were you going to say before? It's important we all share."

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie is dead. This is a shock. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Alice: "I'm shocked by Charlie's death. It must be one of us hiding in plain sight. I'm just a villager, so let's all share our thoughts carefully."
Bob: "Diana, you were the last to speak before Charlie died. What were you doing?"
